author: gradyw
title: 3D Design and Print NFT Spacecoins
description: NFTs need physical products with 3D Designs to represent and manifest for community adoption beyond crypto experts.
solution: Design configurable 3D NFTs through parametric algorithms and 3D print with a build file and final report custom hash tied to the NFT.
experience: Two SpaceX Additive Engineers and Designers with 18 yrs of experience optimizing metal, ceramic and plastic prints and machines
